description.value: Light-winged aarakocra have smaller and lighter wings than average, about 3 feet wide when extended. The shortened size and reduced weight of their wings keeps light-wings swift and nimble. However, much to their frustration, this prevents extended flight. In a people that holds flight in such high regard, their limitations in flight can be seen as an obstacle to overcome, despite their exceptionally fast and nimble flying skills.

system.classDetails:
Light-Winged Aarakocra Traits

  • Compatibility: Avian
  • Attribute Increase: Your Dexterity increases by 1.
  • Increased Flight Speed: Your flying speed is increased by +25ft.
    To use this speed, you cannot be wearing medium or heavy armor, and you must have 5ft of space on each side of you in order to take off.
  • Short-Distance Flyer: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.X6IUSNJH6BDDZ2Y4]{Short-Distance Flyer}
  • Talons: @Compendium[undertaking-chrystalis.abilities.BPZAPCA1C8SN9VNC]{Talons}
  • Extra Language: You can speak, read, and write one language of your choice.
